about.title: About Oro Nacional
about.subtitle: Jalisco tradition and elegance since 1990
about.ourStoryText: Oro Nacional was born in 1990 in the heart of Guadalajara, Jalisco, with the vision of creating fine jewelry that combines Jalisco's artisan tradition with contemporary designs. For over three decades, we have worked with passion and dedication to offer unique pieces that celebrate life's most important moments.
about.ourStoryParagraph1: Oro Nacional was born in 1990 in the heart of Guadalajara, Jalisco, with the vision of creating fine jewelry that reflects the cultural and artisan wealth of our region.
about.ourStoryParagraph2: What began as a small family workshop has become a jewelry store recognized for its commitment to exceptional quality and unique designs that combine tradition and modernity.
about.ourStoryParagraph3: Each piece we create tells a story, carries decades of artisan experience and the pride of being 100% Mexican. Our commitment is to offer jewelry that not only adorns, but becomes family treasures passed down from generation to generation.
about.teamDescription: Meet the artisans behind each unique piece. Passion, dedication and decades of experience in every creation.
about.jeweler1Specialty: Specialist in engagement and wedding rings
about.jeweler1Description: With over three decades perfecting his art, Master Roberto leads our team with incomparable passion and dedication.
about.jeweler2Description: Elena fuses Jalisco tradition with modern trends, creating unique pieces that tell stories.
about.jeweler3Specialty: Setting of precious stones and diamonds
about.jeweler3Description: Carlos's precision in stone setting is legendary, ensuring the security and beauty of each gem.
about.teamClosing: Our master jewelers have dedicated their lives to perfecting the art of jewelry. Each piece that leaves our workshop carries the invisible signature of years of experience, knowledge passed down from generation to generation, and a deep love for the craft.
about.processDescription: Each jewel goes through a meticulous artisan process that guarantees exceptional quality and unique designs.
about.step1Description: Each piece begins with a detailed sketch. Our designers work with you to capture your vision and create a unique design that reflects your story.
about.step2Description: We carefully choose certified 14k or 18k gold and the highest quality precious stones. We only work with reliable and ethical suppliers.
about.step3Description: Our master jewelers bring the design to life using traditional techniques refined over decades. Every detail is worked by hand with millimeter precision.
about.step4Description: Stones are set with specialized techniques that guarantee security and beauty. The final finish includes high-gloss polishing and rhodium plating when necessary.
about.step5Description: Each piece goes through rigorous quality inspections. We verify weight, gold purity, setting security and finishing perfection before delivery.
about.quote: Artisan jewelry is not just about creating beautiful objects, it's about preserving a millennial tradition, honoring manual work and creating treasures that transcend time.
about.certificationsDescription: Your trust is our greatest treasure. We back each piece with certifications and warranties that ensure your investment.
about.cert1Description: Each piece includes a certificate that guarantees the purity of the gold (14k or 18k) and the authenticity of the precious stones.
about.cert2Description: We offer a lifetime warranty on manufacturing and finishes. Free repairs for manufacturing defects.
about.cert3Description: All our diamonds have international certification that validates their quality, cut and characteristics.
about.cert4Description: Cleaning, polishing and professional review at no cost throughout the life of your jewel.
about.cert5Description: We work exclusively with certified suppliers that guarantee ethical and sustainable practices in mining.
about.cert6Description: 30 days for exchanges or returns. Your satisfaction is our number one priority.
about.excellence1Description: Spectrometry analysis to verify the exact purity of gold in each piece we manufacture.
about.excellence2Description: We record the origin of all our materials and the manufacturing process of each jewel.
about.excellence3Description: All our shipments are fully insured against loss, theft or damage during transport.
about.excellence4Description: We offer professional valuation service for insurance purposes at no additional cost.
about.certificationsQuestion: Have questions about our warranties or certifications?
about.contactUsText: and we'll be happy to assist you.
about.workshopImageAlt: Oro Nacional artisan jewelry workshop in Guadalajara
about.ourMissionText: To create the highest quality gold jewelry that captures the essence of special moments, keeping Jalisco's artisan tradition alive and offering exceptional service to each customer.
about.authenticGoldDesc: We work exclusively with certified 14k and 18k gold. Each piece includes an authenticity certificate.
about.artisanTraditionDesc: Our master jewelers have decades of experience in traditional Jalisco techniques.
about.customDesignDesc: We create unique pieces designed exclusively for you and your special moments.
about.lifetimeWarrantyDesc: All our pieces come with a lifetime warranty on manufacturing and authenticity.
about.ourWorkshopText: In our Guadalajara workshop, each piece is created with dedication and care. We use traditional techniques combined with modern technology to ensure the highest quality in every jewel.
about.visitUsText: We invite you to visit our showroom in Guadalajara, where you can see our creations up close and meet our master jewelers.

contact.faq1Q: Can I schedule an appointment to see the jewelry in person?
contact.faq1A: Of course! We recommend scheduling an appointment to provide you with personalized attention. Call us or send us a WhatsApp message to coordinate your visit.
contact.faq2A: Yes, we specialize in custom designs. Our master jewelers will work with you to create the unique piece you imagine. The process takes 2-4 weeks depending on complexity.
contact.faq3A: Yes, we ship throughout Mexico with secure and trackable shipping. Shipping is free on purchases over $5,000 MXN. All our shipments are insured.
contact.faq4Q: How long does it take to respond to my messages?
contact.faq4A: We respond to all messages within 24 hours on business days. Via WhatsApp, response time is generally immediate during our business hours.
